Package FoxRabbit

Interface Summary
Constants Constant interface that defines common constants needed to manipulate data representation in AbstractBoard representations of arrays.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBoard An abstract class that holds the common characteristics between the different implementations of the board.
Animal Grouping superclass that is used to combine common and related behavior and attributes need by the Fox and rabbit classes.
BoundedBoard Bounded array with variable dimensions array representation
Fox Fox class represents the logic provided by the fox to search and traverse the rabbit over the board.
FoxRabbitMain Main application start point
FoxRabbitUI Graphical representation of the game manipulated by arrays data structures Works as a view and controller of that manipulates the model layer of abstraction The class is internally implemented to oscillate between the windows as the state pattern to provide one window handling to all user actions without the need to external dialogues
Loader  
Rabbit Class to represents the motion of the rabbit around the array and mainly controlled by the game player through the user interfacing --> mainly escaping from foxes the min number needed to win
StandardBoard 2 dimensional array representation
TriangularBoard Triangular array representation
